trans-unit.source: ofxstatement is a tool to convert proprietary bank statement to OFX format, suitable for importing to GnuCash. Plugins for ofxstatement parse a particular proprietary bank statement format and produces common data structure, that is then formatted into an OFX file.
trans-unit.target: ofxstatement is a tool to convert proprietary bank statement to OFX format, suitable for importing to GnuCash. Plugins for ofxstatement parse a particular proprietary bank statement format and produces common data structure, that is then formatted into an OFX file.

trans-unit.source: Basically: $ ofxstatement convert -t cbcbe input.csv output.ofx
trans-unit.target: Basically: $ ofxstatement convert -t cbcbe input.csv output.ofx

trans-unit.source: Download from pypi and run $ python setup.py install
trans-unit.target: Download from pypi and run $ python setup.py install

trans-unit.source: Install using pip: $ pip install ofxstatement-be-cbc
trans-unit.target: Install using pip: $ pip install ofxstatement-be-cbc

trans-unit.source: This project provides an ofxstatement plugin for converting the Belgian CBC bank’s CSV format statements to OFX.
trans-unit.target: This project provides an ofxstatement plugin for converting the Belgian CBC bank’s CSV format statements to OFX.

trans-unit.source: Users of ofxstatement have developed several plugins for their banks. They are listed on main ofxstatement site. If your bank is missing, you can develop your own plugin.
trans-unit.target: Users of ofxstatement have developed several plugins for their banks. They are listed on main ofxstatement site. If your bank is missing, you can develop your own plugin.

trans-unit.source: ofxstatement plugin for parsing Belgian CBC bank's CSV statements to OFX
trans-unit.target: плагин для разбора CSV-выписок бельгийского банка CBC в OFX.
